sg.edu.nus.comp.cs4218.impl.parser

Class ArgsParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • sg.edu.nus.comp.cs4218.impl.parser.ArgsParser
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GrepArgsParser, LsArgsParser, MvArgsParser, RmArgsParser

    public class ArgsParser
extends java.lang.Object
    Every application's parser should extend this class to encapsulate their own parsing details and information.

    • Method Detail

      • parse

        public void parse(java.lang.String... args)
           throws InvalidArgsException
        Separates command flags from non-flag arguments given a tokenized command.
        Parameters:
        args - input arguments
        Throws:
        InvalidArgsException

      • validateArgs

        protected void validateArgs()
                     throws InvalidArgsException
        Checks for the existence of illegal flags. Presence of any illegal flags would result in a non-empty set after subtracting the set of legal flags from the set of parsed flags.

        Note on usage: Do not call this method directly in any application.

        Throws:
        InvalidArgsException
